Title: Directs the New York state thruway authority to conduct a study exploring the cost of modernizing E-ZPass toll booth systems to allow for faster crossing of toll areas
Summary: Directs the New York state thruway authority to conduct a study exploring the cost of modernizing E-ZPass toll booth systems to allow for faster crossing of toll areas.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the New York state thruway authority to conduct a study exploring the cost of modernizing E-ZPass toll booth systems to allow for faster crossing of toll areas
